name: Bastille
description:
Bastille is a game made for the GGames game jam, by two people.

It tells the non-historical story of the evasion of Hubert de Solages, a french noble, imprisonned for monstrous crime, during the French Revolution.

This pixel art-style project is somewhere between a rogue-like and a maze.

You will have to find the exit while avoiding the swiss mercenaries who historically guarded this place.

Arrow keys to move and space to attack.
